item.title: seema add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "He was still too young to know that the heart's memory eliminates the bad and magnifies the good, and that thanks to this artifice we manage to endure the burden of the past." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: seema add a quote by Jessica Mitford
item.description: "You may not be able to change the world, but at least you can embarrass the guilty." -- Jessica Mitford

item.title: seema add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "The snake which cannot cast its skin has to die. As well the minds which are prevented from changing their opinions; they cease to be mind." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: seema add a quote by Pericles
item.description: "Just because you do not take an interest in politics doesn't mean politics won't take an interest in you. " -- Pericles

item.title: seema add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: seema add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: seema add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Where there is love there is life." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: seema add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description:
"Seven Deadly Sins
Wealth without work Pleasure without conscience Science without humanity Knowledge without character Politics without principle Commerce without morality Worship without sacrifice." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: seema add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Hate the sin, love the sinner." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: seema add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: seema add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Whatever you do will be insignificant, but it is very important that you do it." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: seema add a quote by Indira Gandhi
item.description: "The power to question is the basis of all human progress." -- Indira Gandhi

item.title: seema add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: seema add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: seema add a quote by Thomas Pynchon
item.description: "Shall I project a world?" -- Thomas Pynchon
